snippet: A funeral was held for Bobby Clark, one of three people killed in a string of shootings on April 6, as prosecutors charged two suspects with first-degree murder and hate crimes.
abstract: Funeral is held for Bobby Clark, one of three black people killed in a string of shootings in Tulsa, Okla, as prosecutors charge Alvin L Watts and Jacob C England with first-degree murder and hate crimes.
lead_paragraph: A funeral was held for Bobby Clark, one of three people killed in a string of shootings on April 6, as prosecutors charged two suspects with first-degree murder and hate crimes.

headline.main: One Fate in Tulsa for 3 Strangers Familiar With Struggle
headline.print_headline: 3 Tulsa Strangers, Familiar With Struggle, Met One Fate
